src:
NOTÍCIA
Mercado atingiu hoje outra máxima histórica e temos força financeira, diz Trump
01 Nov 2019 by O Povo
O presidente dos Estados Unidos, Donald Trump, afirmou nesta sexta-feira que o país agora tem "força financeira" e comentou o desempenho positivo do mercado acionário de Nova York. "O mercado financeiro atingiu hoje outra máxima histórica", celebrou, durante discurso em Tupelo, Mississippi.Em sua fala, Trump defendeu seu governo, ao afirmar que tem investido nas Forças Armadas e trabalhado para fortalecer a economia. Além disso, fez várias críticas à oposição democrata, já com vistas à eleição presidencial de 2020.
Dúvidas, críticas e sugestões? Fale com a gente
text:
NEWS
Market hit another historic high today and we have financial strength, says Trump
01 Nov 2019 by The People
US President Donald Trump said on Friday that the country now has "financial strength" and commented on the positive performance of the New York stock market. "The financial market has reached another historic high today," he said during a speech in Tupelo, Mississippi. In his speech, Trump defended his government, saying that he has invested in the Armed Forces and worked to strengthen the economy. He also criticized the Democratic opposition for the 2020 presidential election.
Questions, criticisms and suggestions? Talk to us
